args:
When the group finds several treasure maps
leading to a tropical island, they decide to make
a party out of it and immediately head out.
After a quick swimsuit change, they split into
three groups and begin the hunt in earnest.
Noice! Looks like we got ourselves\nsome treasure maps!
Well, there's certainly nothing at all\nsuspicious about this.
I found 'em inside a bottle, Cleo.\nA BOTTLE!
Three maps marked with Xs inside an\nold bottle? What else could they be?!
It would be fun if it were true,\nbut I think I'm with Cleo here.
Guys, I got 'em from an old antiques\ndealer who said he picked the bottle up\non the shore. What else do you need?!
You are putting your trust in a peddler\nwho sold you something that was just\nlying on the ground?
Give those here, Luca. ...Well, I'll be.\nThese are maps of Lewis Island.
YOU SEE?! Celliera knows the score!\nSo if you don't wanna trust me,\nyou should at least trust her.
I make no claims as to the veracity of the\ntreasure portion, but it IS a lovely place.
Lewis Island? Hell, I love that place!\nNothin' but white sand and blue skies,\nfar as the eye can see.
Actually, that ain't a bad idea. \nWhaddya think, boss?

We've got a boatload'a new pals floatin'
around the castle these days, so a little
team bondin' on a tropical island might
be good for everybody.
Well, even if the treasure doesn't pan\nout, I won't say no to a little vacation\non a sunny beach.
We can run marathon sprints on the wet\nsand and follow that up with a few rounds\nof ocean squat thrusts!
It'll be like a reboot of everyone's training!
Heh. Just try not to run us\ninto the ground, all right?
You should join us, Julietta. As fellow\nPaladyns, this will be a perfect chance\nfor us to learn more about each other.
You want to get to know me better,\nElly?! ...Er, I mean, Elisanne!
Well, of COURSE I will go!
I thought you were going to spend the\nsummer at a private beach?
Good! I know we will have a most\ndelightful time.
I guess that just leaves you, Verica.
I'll have to passâ€”I have plans to go on a\nlong trip and open a divination stand.
That said, I was actually planning to go\nto that very island, so I'll try to stop by\nduring any free time I might have.
After changing into swimsuits, the group made\ntheir way to sunny Lewis Island and headed\nstraight for the beach.
Oh wow, this water is perfect.\nWho's up for a swim?!
Stop right there! You must warm up\nproperly before entering the water!
If you dive right in and get a cramp,\nit could be curtains! ...CURTAINS!
You know, I'm actually sort of surprised\nyou agreed to come with us.

Someone needs to ensure that you
all remain on your best behavior
and don't engage in any strange
or indecent activities!
The summer sun often makes people\nlose all sense of decorum and discretion.
Enough chatter! Let's make with the\ntreasure huntin' already!
Well, we have three maps here,\nso maybe we should split into\nthree teams and check each one.
Now THAT sounds like a plan!
I'm sure I can come up with ample\ntraining opportunities even in the\nmidst of such an adventure.
U-um, Elisanne?\nPerhaps you would like to go\ntreasure-hunting...together?
Purely to help Luca, of course. CERTAINLY\nnot because I hope to grow closer to you\nin the process. Er, that is...
While I have little interest in treasure,\nI am always prepared to aid a friend.\nMight I take one of the maps, Luca?
Hmm. This seems to lead to a dense\njungle area. Shall we be off, Julietta?
Oh, Elly! I'm so happy that...\nEr, I mean, ELISANNE!\nYes, that's what I said.
Thanks for the assists, everybody.\nOh, and don't worryâ€”we'll split the\nbooty equally once we track it down.
Now if you'll excuse me, I'm off to find\nthe treasure on this here map.
Well, everyone certainly seems excited\nabout this particular endeavor.
No, I think I will stay here and find\na shady spot to relax in.
Being prepared for the unexpected is part\nof an attendant's duty, after all.
If you're going to relax on the beach,\nshouldn't you be wearing a swimsuit?
How dare you harangue a woman\ninto donning a swimsuit!
Was THAT your motive for coming to the\nbeach this whole time, you scoundrel?!
By the way, Estelle, is it quite all right\nto permit him to keep doing that?
...Rats! Nothin'. Guess I'll try diggin'\na little bit over here.
AAAAUGH! HE'S COVERING THE\nENTIRE BEACH IN HOLES!
If you know a way to dig for treasure\nWITHOUT makin' holes, I'm all ears.\n...'Course I'm all ears anyway. Nya ha!
If you are going to dig holes, I insist that\nyou fill them in afterward. Someone could\neasily sprain an ankle in one of these!
Oh dang, you're right. I'll make sure to\nfill 'em in once I'm done, yeah?
I've no problem with a treasure hunt,\nbut you MUST practice moderation.
Seeing your shenanigans makes me\nwonder what everyone ELSE is up to.\nTime for a decency check!
Man, Estelle can be BRUTAL sometimes.
Heh. It's proof she's a kind soul\nwho cares about us all.
She just doesn't want to see anyone\nget hurt. Nothing wrong with that.

As the lord of the castle, you are
responsible for the actions of your people.
Now come with me so we can ensure
they don't get up to more mischief!
Can't argue with that. I'm on my way!
